nodes.bodyText: How about adding a message to the exception? Could use different message for the two cases (!session.canSendRequest() and id >= MAX_NUM_REQUESTS_SENT)
I think failAndReset() is enough. Whether a channel is active or not doesn't matter much because the RST_STREAM frame would not be sent even if we didn't have if (ch.isActive()).
The prefix ++ seems increment and get the numRequestsSent.
Don't we need to wrap this cause with UnprocessedRequestException?

Question: We don't need to care about the type of cause just in case the cause is instance of UnprocessedRequestException already?
If the cause can not be UnprocessedRequestException, skip this review 😀
I think that's not going to happen. If so, I should unwrap the cause and call failAndReset on line 246. I think it's not worth. 😄
